verses.t: God{H430} is our refuge{H4268} and strength{H5797}, a very{H3966} present{H4672} help{H5833} in trouble{H6869}.for: or, of
Therefore will not we fear{H3372}, though the earth{H776} be removed{H4171}, and though the mountains{H2022} be carried{H4131} into the midst{H3820} of the sea{H3220};midst…: Heb. heart of the seas
Though the waters{H4325} thereof roar{H1993} and be troubled{H2560}, though the mountains{H2022} shake{H7493} with the swelling{H1346} thereof. Selah{H5542}.
There is a river{H5104}, the streams{H6388} whereof shall make glad{H8055} the city{H5892} of God{H430}, the holy{H6918} place of the tabernacles{H4908} of the most High{H5945}.
God{H430} is in the midst{H7130} of her; she shall not be moved{H4131}: God{H430} shall help{H5826} her, and that right{H6437} early{H1242}.and…: Heb. when the morning appeareth
The heathen{H1471} raged{H1993}, the kingdoms{H4467} were moved{H4131}: he uttered{H5414} his voice{H6963}, the earth{H776} melted{H4127}.
LordThe {H3068} of hosts{H6635} is with us; the God{H430} of Jacob{H3290} is our refuge{H4869}. Selah{H5542}.our…: Heb. an high place for us
Come{H3212}, behold{H2372} the works{H4659} Lordof the {H3068}, what desolations{H8047}he hath made{H7760} in the earth{H776}.

He maketh wars{H4421} to cease{H7673} unto the end{H7097} of the earth{H776}; he breaketh{H7665} the bow{H7198}, and cutteth{H7112} the spear{H2595} in sunder{H7112}; he burneth{H8313} the chariot{H5699} in the fire{H784}.
Be still{H7503}, and know{H3045} that I am God{H430}: I will be exalted{H7311} among the heathen{H1471}, I will be exalted{H7311} in the earth{H776}.
LordThe {H3068} of hosts{H6635} is with us; the God{H430} of Jacob{H3290} is our refuge{H4869}. Selah{H5542}.
